a9fa3ed4-f1fe-4859-87c0-0c00ce5b745b.name: Enhanced Move (Ground)
a9fa3ed4-f1fe-4859-87c0-0c00ce5b745b.notes: Multiply normal Ground Move by 1 + level

a73e1d65-eb06-4fb6-922f-4a46b0987c10.notes: Multiply normal Flight Move by 1 + level; Must have Flying ability

c6af184a-e15b-4cc1-a682-45f0ae9be1a9.notes: Multiply normal Water Move by 1 + level; Must have Amphibian Ability

features.situation: 来自过去的受害者以及任何具有共情的角色
对于恐吓和折磨的手段来进行的审讯和威吓技能检定
来自当你表现出自我中心时的其他人

9d795adf-2ef1-418c-8592-0671d798b896.name: 无我
9d795adf-2ef1-418c-8592-0671d798b896.notes: 为了把你的需要——哪怕是生死——置于他人的需要之前，也需要进行一次自控检定。

841d9491-99d9-40c7-a752-8a6a4bb94e04.name: 9 - Choose two Skills from the following list:

b8e28425-2081-4a91-b33e-e8c0d6563003.name: 10 - Choose three Skills from the following list:

c6c42d07-d666-4c21-8366-20c0566c6f5a.text:
2000 Points - You fit the most common of all heroic patterns: amazing strength, speed, and durability, plus the ability to fly (or something close to it). You’re powerful enough to be almost immune to forcible restraint. If you’re a hero, you’re law-abiding or honorable because of your personal convictions; if you’re a villain
or anti-hero, you’re driven by a sense of superiority to ordinary mortals.
